description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle widget, including functions for initializing the puzzle, handling user interactions, calculating grid coordinates, building the puzzle table, checking answers, and managing navigation and highlighting within the puzzle.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sorts data, sets event handlers, calculates grid coordinates, builds the puzzle table and entries, and sets initial focus.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for each puzzle entry based on starting positions and orientations, and adds clues to the DOM.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Builds the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry, assigns classes, and adds entry numbers.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input group matches the correct answer, marks it as solved if correct, and moves to the next input.
